welcome_message_body: Welcome to Messina, where ancient history and stunning architecture meet the sparkling waters of the Mediterranean. Discover the city's rich cultural heritage, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality as you explore all that Messina has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
